task.summary: before replacing ArrayLists from MainService. Work time will be stored in a new Application class
before adding support of only active applications tracking
added support of only active application tracking, before some refactoring
before adding separate class named Interval
Added new class UsageStatsDataSource, removed some code from DBHelper to UsageStatsDateSource
Fetching data from DB is implemented in fragments not PagerAdapter
